snippet: A review of the incident, which occurred in January when two 50-foot Navy boats strayed into the waters near Farsi Island, found widespread mistakes....
abstract: United States Navy disciplines nine officers and sailors for numerous errors that led to Jan 2016 capture of two 2 patrol boats and their crews by Iran's Revolutionary Guards; provides additional details on incident, which contrast with simpler narrative initially offered by Obama administration.
lead_paragraph: A review of the incident, which occurred in January when two 50-foot Navy boats strayed into the waters near Farsi Island, found widespread mistakes.

headline.main: 9 in Navy Disciplined Over Iran’s Capture of Sailors
headline.print_headline: Navy Punishes 9 in Capture of 2 Patrol Boats by Iran

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
